cards.effect_description: [End of Your Turn] If you have 3 or less Life cards, set up to 1 {Egghead} type Character with a cost of 5 or less as active.
cards.trigger_description: [Trigger] Play this card.

cards.name: Sabo
cards.effect_description: [On Play] You may trash 1 card from your hand: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less and up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less.
